attributes.action: Scotland International Football Matches on terrestrial TV
attributes.additional_details: Because it’s unfair that England and Wales get to see their teams for free but Scotland don’t!
attributes.background: Ensure Scottish International Football Matches are shown on terrestrial TV the same as England and Wales!

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about what sporting events to broadcast are a matter for individual broadcasters, not the UK Government or Parliament.
